metadata.title: CVE-2016-5833 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the column_title function in wp-admin/includes/class-wp-media-list-table.php in WordPress before 4.5.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted attachment name, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-5834.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5833` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentytwo - 4.5.3+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.3+dfsg-1').
